title: SoCo Furnished Bungalow, Amazing Location
posting_body: Reply to this listing for more information.
This is a two bedroom, one bathroom home in the heart of the Bouldin Creek neighborhood.
It's walking distance to the best spots on South Congress and South 1st streets.
It's also just about a mile from downtown, and very accessible to most parts of Austin because of its central location.
This house was built in the 1930s, and is a smaller home but has a lot of charm—with Saltillo tile floors and lots of lush greenery as the home is adjacent to the creek.
It features an open floor-plan throughout the living, dining, and kitchen areas.
The house is fully furnished, and includes a queen bed in both of the bedrooms.
There is a screened in front patio for enjoying the beautiful Austin weather (and often great people watching).
We recently purchased new appliances (washer/dryer/oven/dishwasher), so though the house is older it has all the modern conveniences needed.
Utilities, gas, water, and internet are included in the rent.
There is also an Apple TV so you can log into any streaming services.
There's also a driveway with two parking spots, and often extra free parking in the street.
